sentences.en: a fierce rivalry for world supremacy
sentences.cn: 夺取世界霸权的激烈竞争

sentences.en: Concerns about rivalry with HP and IBM may be overdone, he said.
sentences.cn: 他表示,对于与惠普与IBM竞争的忧虑可能过度了.

sentences.en: Despite their bitter screen rivalry, off-stage they are close friends.
sentences.cn: 虽然他们在银幕上是誓不两立的对手，在现实生活中却是至交。

sentences.en: He had a lot of rivalry with his brothers and sisters.
sentences.cn: 他和兄弟姐妹间经常较劲。

sentences.en: He was incited to achievement by rivalry.
sentences.cn: 竞争激励他努力取得成就.

sentences.en: I laughed aloud as the yolks of their eyeballs rolled toward us in haughty rivalry.
sentences.cn: 他们冲着我们翻翻白眼,一副傲慢争先的神气,我看了忍不住放声大笑.

sentences.en: In this way, it effectively shut out all price rivalry.
sentences.cn: 用这种方法有效地排斥了一切价格竞争.

sentences.en: It is noticeable that women do not have the rivalry that men have.
sentences.cn: 显而易见，女性不像男人们那样好勇斗狠。

sentences.en: It reminds one of sibling rivalry.
sentences.cn: 它让我们想起敌对的兄弟。

sentences.en: Officials anticipate that rivalry between leaders of the various drug factions could erupt into full scale war.
sentences.cn: 官员们预计各个毒品团伙头目之间的对抗可能会引发一场全面的冲突。

sentences.en: Rivalry among business firms grew more intense.
sentences.cn: 公司间的竞争趋于激烈.

sentences.en: Rivalry with other schools is encouraged.
She had never overcome her feelings of sibling rivalry (= rivalry between brothers and sisters ) .
sentences.cn: 她一直没有克服和兄弟姐妹较劲的那种心理。

sentences.en: Sibling rivalry often causes parents anxieties.
sentences.cn: 手足之争常让父母忧心忡忡。

sentences.en: The minute there's some rivalry over a girl , your ears start flapping.
sentences.cn: 厂里一有了吃醋争风那样的事, 你们的耳朵就会通灵!

sentences.en: The quarrel originated in rivalry between the two families.
sentences.cn: 这次争吵是两家不和引起的.

sentences.en: The rivalry between analysts and geometers grew very bitter.
sentences.cn: 分析学家与几何学家之间的对抗非常激烈.

sentences.en: The two players have developed a friendly rivalry .
sentences.cn: 这两名选手之间已形成一种友好的竞争关系。

sentences.en: There were many reasons for this, one of them being the perpetual rivalry among her cities.
sentences.cn: 对此有许多解释, 其中原因之一是城市间永不停息的竞争.

trans.tran_cn: 竞争，对抗，对立，竞争行为，对抗行为
trans.tran_en: a situation in which two or more people, teams, or companies are competing for something, especially over a long period of time, and the feeling of competition between them
